Pin Function: This pin is the MOSFET Source
Pin description: Typically connected to reference or ground in lowâˆ’side switching circuits. Provides the reference for controlling current flow through the MOSFET.

Pin Function: This pin is the MOSFET Gate
Pin description: Control terminal for the MOSFET channel. The voltage level at this pin relative to the Source determines conduction.

Pin Function: This pin is the MOSFET Drain
Pin description: Carries the load current when the MOSFET is turned on. Usually connected to the load or supply rail.
